title: Shop
description: Web application that manages the inventory, the creation of purchase orders, the registration of hours you work and the creation of the weekly payslip

title: Pocket's astronomy
description: This application shows some information available in the public API of NASA.

title: Recipes
description: Web application that works as a repository of food recipes where the user searches, associates a category and creates their own recipes.

title: Puzzle
description: This puzzle is a board game whose objective is to order a set of numbers correctly moving the tokens of it.
